entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , La Scie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:53 PM NST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Scie 7:30 PM NST Friday 30 December 2022
Temperature: -5.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -8.7°C
Wind: SW 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 12 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers in the evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 30 December 2022
